# Year-End Review Generator - Project Instructions

## Project Overview
Web-based employee year-end review generator application that compares actual performance metrics against targets and generates AI-powered review paragraphs.

## Metrics Tracked

### Reliability Metrics
- Emergency Safety Hazard: 0 infractions (100% compliance)
- Unsubstantiated ACC complaints: 0
- Clicks on Phishing Emails: 0
- Red flag events: 0
- Deposit waiver: 100% accuracy

### Driver and Sub-driver Metrics
- Schedule adherence: 93%
- CX Rep Overall: 80%
- FCR (First Call Resolution): 70%
- Transfers: less than 6%
- Overall Sentiment: 88%
- Positive word choice: 86%
- Negative word: 83%
- Managing Emotions: 95%
- AHT (Average Handle Time): Lower than 440 seconds
- ACE (sub-driver): less than 60 seconds
- Hold time: less than 30 seconds
- Reliability: less than 16 hours

## Features
- Input employee name and pronouns
- Input actual metrics for comparison
- Generate AI-powered review paragraph
- Highlight strengths and areas for improvement
- Display results on screen
- Export to Word document

## Tech Stack
- HTML5
- CSS3
- JavaScript (Vanilla)
- docx.js for Word export
